text: 7.6 Lom 2.29, 6.4, 8.2, 2 Ko 3.6 Mɨñɨl pen takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak chɨnop nag lup ak asɨkɨl, chɨn monmon amnɨgun tek lup. Chɨn kumɨl tɨkjakɨl mɨdobun tek lup, tap ned chɨnop chɨchɨk dolɨgup ak kelɨgɨpun. Anɨb ak tek wog mɨñɨl gobun ak, takaw kɨles mɨj mɨgan ayaŋ kɨl tɨk lek pel apal wog ak ma gobun. God Kawnan ne ak chɨnop gek, wog kɨdeyɨl ak nop gɨñobun.
